About Me

Hi! I'm Peter, an Instructional Writer with a background in technical writing and web development. I'm currently seeking to formally transition into elearning development and instructional design.

My Background

I’m an Instructional Designer who fell into this field by accident but loved it immediately when I learned how it was a perfect mix of everything I enjoyed most from my previous positions.

As an onboarding specialist at a law firm, I found it very rewarding training new hires and watching them grow from feeling overwhelmed to competent in just a few weeks.

Before that position, I worked in marketing and advertising, where I enjoyed researching target audiences, and designing deliverables based off their perspective.

Because of my passion for this field, during my first six months at AllenComm, I was able to grow from writing assistant to project lead on multiple accounts including Morgan Stanley, ACM, and E*TRADE where I produced deliverables for over 100,000 learners collectively.
